'''''Minecraft: Spring to Life''''' is a single consisting of a remix of [[otherside]] to promote the game drop of the same name. Like the extended play released alongside [[Minecraft: The Garden Awakens|The Garden Awakens]], this song has not been added to the game. It released on March 25, 2025.
